scripts.lint: yarn --cwd ./quasar run lint && yarn --cwd ./firebase/functions run lint
scripts.test: yarn --cwd ./quasar run test && yarn --cwd ./firebase/functions run test
scripts.deploy: yarn --cwd ./quasar quasar build && cd firebase && firebase deploy
scripts.deploy:quasar: yarn --cwd ./quasar quasar build && cd firebase && firebase deploy --only hosting
